rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 80K CRU, 80M CSM

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: 30% of the reward will be released immediately, and 10% will be released for each subsequent lease period (each 6 weeks).

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: Initial supply of 21 million KSX, increased with 10% additional issuance every year

rewardRules.label: Bonus
content: Quantity Bonus:Up to 120% bonus depending on KSM amount
Referral: 5% referral bonus reward each to referral and referee

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: KSX will be distributed when the network is launched and connected to Kusama.

rewardRules.label: Reward Pool
content: - Our Shiden token reward budget is fixed at 350,000 SDN
- In other words, if we achieve our goal of 15,000 KSM, then for every 1 KSM contributed, you will be given 23.33 SDN

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: SDN rewards will be distributed linearly in each block (48 weeks)

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: • 30% will be released at TGE
• 70% will be released by block over duration

rewardRules.label: Project Bonus
content: • Contributors through Parallel Finance will receive an extra 10% DHX Tokens if crowdloan is successful.

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: • 30% of the total reward pool will be distributed upon successful launch
• the remaining 70% of the reward pool will vest over the slot lease duration (48 weeks)

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: • 30% will be released at TGE
• 70% will be released by block over duration

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 1,000,000 TEER (10% of total token allocation)
You will receive: (Your KSM contribution / Total KSM contribution)*1,000,000

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: TEER will be vested linearly during the 48-week lease period, starting shortly after winning a slot.

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 1,000,000 TEER (10% of total token allocation)You will receive: (Your KSM contribution / Total KSM contribution)*1,000,000

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: TEER will be vested linearly during the 48-week lease period, starting shortly after winning a slot.

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 150,000,000 GENS (12.5% of total token supply)

rewardRules.label: Bonus
content: 1,000 GENS per KSM for contributions over 500 KSM
Loyalty: 500 GENS per KSM for everyone who previously participated in the first and/or second rounds of Kusama auctions
Referral: 6% bonus for referral program participants (3% for referral + 3% for referrie)

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: TEER will be vested linearly during the 48-week lease period, starting shortly after winning a slot.

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 3,000,000,000 KMA (30% of total token allocation)

rewardRules.label: Bonus
content: The first 500 contributors receive an extra 10% bonus Calamari. The next 500 contributors receive an extra 5% bonus Calamari.

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: 34% released immediately; remainder vesting every 8 weeks on an equal basis.

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 25,000,000 HKO (2.5% of total token allocation)Reward Rate = total HKO rewards / total KSM contribution

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: The tokens rewarded will be unvested linearly across a one year time frame.

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 4,500,000 KILT (3% of total token allocation)You can get a minimum of 25 KILT Coins per 1 KSM that you bid in support of KILT’s parachain slot. If the maximum cap is not achieved, you would receive even more.

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: 50% KILT will be released immediately, 50% will be released linearly within 24 weeks

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 2,000,000,000 PICA (20% of total token allocation)

bulletPoints: 5% applies to users who have already participated as well as those who participate in the 12h period starting at 10pm CET.
Users who participate in the first three days will receive a 10% bonus

content.text: Referral: 20% bonus on their Picasso Network tokens if they bring in other users contributing a total of 100 KSM or more
Loyalty: 5% bonus to contributors who previously staked in Picasso crowdloan, and restake the same amount or greater

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: 50% released at TGE; 50% linearly release over 48 weeks

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: Up to 80,000,000 AIR (15.8% of total token allocation)

rewardRules.label: Bonus
content: 10% bonus for early birds; 5% reward on referrals

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: The initial transferrable amount of AIR reward is 25%. The remaining vests over the lease period of 48 weeks.

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 15,000,000,000 BSX (15% of total token allocation) & 56,873,469 HDX You will receive: (Your KSM contribution / Total KSM contribution)*15,000,000,000

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: BSX rewards and HDX bonuses are distributed linearly. The distribution will start once the Basilisk LBP event has been concluded (~2 weeks after the parachain slot is won) and will continue until 1 week before the parachain slot expires.

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 1,000,000 KINT (10% of total token allocation)

rewardRules.label: Bonus
content: 5% bonus for participants during the first 3 days of the crowdloan; Additional KINT distributed as part of a referral program. 5% of the KSM lockup for both the referrer and the referee.

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: 30% transferable right after airdrop. Remaining 70% subject to 48-week linear vesting (parachain lease period)

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 80,000,000 QTZ (8% of total token supply)

bulletPoints: The first KSM contributed will get 750 QTZ
For subsequent KSM bonded, refer to the chart or use the calculator to check how many QTZ will you receive for the KSM you want to bond: https://unique.network/quartz/crowdloan/.

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: 10 months linear vesting by block

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 15,000,000 NEER (15% of total token supply)

rewardRules.label: Bonus
content: Early bird: First 1,000 Contributors get extra 10%
Referral: Reward 5% split between referral and referee

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: 15% - 30% at TGE, 70% Linear release for 12 months.

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: Up to 160,000,000 TUR (16% of total token supply)

rewardRules.label: Bonus
content: Crowdloan Opening Bonus: Contributors who contribute before 22 Mar 2022 18:00 UTC get extra 10%
Crowdloan Ending Bonus: Contributors who contribute after 22 Mar 2022 18:00 UTC get extra 5%
Referral: Reward 10% of receivers' base split between sender and receiver

Community Bonus: TUR crowdloan tokens earned through group effort of all participants who contributed above 1 KSM. Every participant who contributes a minimum of 1 KSM will receive a community bonus based on the total number of contributors. This reward is to encourage decentralization and incentivize contributors to grow the community.

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: 30% on 04 May 2022, 70% linear release every 4 months for 12 months.

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: 100% vests over the lease period of 48 weeks.

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 5,000,000 BAJU (10% of total token supply)

rewardRules.label: Bonus
content: Early Bird Bonus #1: First 1000 contributions of at least 5 KSM get extra 10% Bonus.
Early Bird Bonus #2: First 500 contributions of at least 1 KSM get extra 5% Bonus.
Referral Bonus: Refer a friend and share a 10% referral bonus (Referrer gets 5%, the referee gets 5%).

NFT Reward Bonus: Here comes the fun part! For each KSM you contribute, you get at least two free-mints* of the exclusive Awesome Ajuna Avatars (AAAs). Awesome Ajuna Avatars (AAAs) is a game about minting and forging legendary avatars as NFTs. (*free-mints: only gas fee apply)

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: 35% initially unlocked, 65% linearly vested over lease period 48 weeks.

rewardRules.label: Total Rewards
content: 5,000,000 HKO + cKSM
The first 8,000 KSM contributions will be rewarded with 500 HKO per KSM contributed. Afterwards, the reward rate will be 200 HKO per KSM, up to the max cap.

rewardRules.label: Bonus
content: 10% HKO Bonus reward will be given to investors who participated with the same wallet address in our first crowdloan last year

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: HKO rewards will be distributed upon successful launch on the new parachain slot and will vest linearly over the slot lease duration (~48 weeks).
